description: Lob is a Pokémon Trainer that faced Ash Ketchum in a Pokémon World Championships Normal Class battle in Shalour City during the Battle Festival Challenge. Despite a good tactic to defend against Pikachu`s Thunderbolt, he didn`t last too long in the battle as Pikachu`s Iron Tail knocked it out to give Ash Ketchum the match victory. Defeating Lob gave Ash Ketchum his third straight win of the day raising his rank to 1,022.
name: Rob
